entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the western parts. Snowfall of 3 to 5 inches on the east slopes. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:10AM MST until December 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations for the mountains of 1 to 2 feet with locally up to 3 feet in the upper Cottonwood Canyons. Total snow accumulations for southwest Wyoming of 3 to 7 inches are expected, with winds gusting as high as 45 mph.
